text: Digaula ne gaamai nadau boolo baalanga, nia boolo ala ne hai gi nia gelegele, nia gahala mono tei, mono meegai ang gi David mo ana daangada. Nia meegai la nia hagadilinga meegai baalangi: palaawaa ‘wheat’, palaawaa ‘barley’, palaawaa, huwa laagau ne lala, ‘bean’, ‘pea’, ‘honey’, ‘cheese’, ‘cream’ mono siibi. Idimaa, digaula gu iloo bolo David mo ana daangada la ga hiigai, hieinu, gei e duadua i lodo di anggowaa.
